Im back in black, not realy my shirt is blue but that doesnt matter soooo people this could be a long post so get ready for this. We dont have school tommorow because it is cold pffft too cold ive never heard of something so stupid a "cold day" what about the people how live in alaska do they have cold days i bet not they just bundle into there eskimo costumes and their all set. Thats what we need we just all need to dress like eskimos if i was an eskimo i would eat whale blubber. Blubber is funny word Say that three times fast. You know what else is a funny word quaternary guess what that means well i dont feel like telling you. If i knew why people can be so stupid i could probably save the world from all evil stupidity is the root of all evil non the less i dont know why. Why are some blonds stupid. of the building the time was to short for me to tell if what i was seeing could realy be by the time i comprehended i finaly fell a blond being smart was a story to tell i told all the world all the fishes in the sea all them acted the same they just laughed at me and said this blond could not be A poem about blondes for someone who can spell that so yeah what else can i say its not late enuogh for me to be writing here i write more later

there must be a bad case of pink eye going around since bills eye keeps itching him which doesnt make sense(no it makes change). Kind of like in bills essay "things at this time were big" whatever that is supposed to meen. I like big words and i have a full sized dictionary with full sized words in it. Lets give that a whirl. I cant find my dictionary but i found a book called feng shui for dummies lets quote that "the back half of the house is more naturaly the yin" get it good. He want his drugs back says the T.V. someday im gonna have a crib like on MTV cribs. i used to have a crib when i was a baby but my mom got rid of it so now i cant be on the show and that make me sad. how does my grammar look since i have an english exam tommorow probably not so good "how could we be slow were too fast to be slow" something i said today whenever i hear a quote ill write it here im realy bored i dont have anything to write but thats never stopped me before im just going to looke around and tell a story. My life story i was born in RI and then i lived in RI and that my life study up theres a quiz tommorow so yeah i dont even make sense(no i make change) to myslef im so confused WHY WHy is everything here? only i know but if i told you the consequenses could be dire muahahaha Time travel cloning all weird sublects like ghosts im just confusing i dont know what im writing so confused tired stupid im losing it here what going on when i figure it out ill tell you the reader(bill) see that what thinking does to you. ill never philosiphise agian oooh look a big word. why who knows god bill me my mom dad brother ryan the world may never know one ring to rule them all one ring to find them one ring to bring them all and in darkness bind them good thing i traded a taco for my preciousssss its mine no one can have it thieves sneaksy little thievesss every one wants it but its mine me and ian are having a hair growing competion i think im winning Are bigfoot and the lockness monster real i think if they were real people would have found them what about the bermuda triangle is there something weird there wait ill go check nope it seem normal to me that good i wont get lost i think im almost done know so ill start slowing down my mind. Big foot says "you dont have a camera" im done im leaving see everybody around

wow its early only 7:32 i think maybe ill come back here and type stuff later but first ill tell you about going to ians house. He asked if he could come over and i said can i come over you house and he said this weekend or as i decided to interpret it "this we can" haha get it ill type more later

"hey people mainly bill the only one who reads this" i said as i typed out yhe intro to my latest entry. As i looked at the clock i read that it was 12:10 i turned to look at the T.V. even stevens was on and i was watching it. I looked around then i decided i was bored of typing and talking this way so i decided to go back to normal. I bet bill is the only one who looks at this so ill talk to him. Hey bill, WHats Up??? your probably talking to the computer i cant realy hear you so you can stop answering me now. I think, no i know, i got 100 on my take home math test otherwise i would be sad. Period seven band long tommorow thats always fun so i just though i would let you the reader(bill) know. Pete PETE PETEP EEPTETPEt since he doesnt like his name online so now more people can stalk him home Call me little PEPE Clap if im fat I alway know when theres turkey in the house You know what i think is funny things that arent realy smart sounding but advertizers try to make it look smarter Like CSL .......or what its chiminey sweeping log not so smart know is it. im done now

note to self- making notes to yourself is kind of weird especialy when bill notes smelling my underwear(to bad i dont keep my underwear under there there, ha i made you say underwear) weird yeah. under the red hot moon we take the bus downtown to the grave yard shift tonight. shes a punk rocker she dont trust no one im listening that song of no my virgin ears a bad word better turn it off but i wont im such a rebel. No apstrophies however yo spell that. (period) What happened to day? i think i found a piece of bagel in my computer the patriots are going to the superbowl brewster bought ps2 and ddr we sledded a little ian smells he drew it himself (what a bad artist) thats about it no school tommorow thanks to martin luther king jr. we have one more day in the summer that sucks not realy i dont realy care. what a cool mustache my sideburns are mad nice oh yeah i said i was going to write a poem about fat peeps so here it comes when the doctor looked for the cause of death he looked at all the things inside of him the doctor looked he said all in one breath the fat in the stomach made his life dim the fat man had lived and eaten many things he ate like he had been trapped on the land he imagined about three chiken wings with the power of the chicken in hand he left that so very desolate place then he died because he stuffed his face the story of a fat person i cant let this entry be so short since i haven"""""""""""""""""""""""'t written in it for a little while. (note the """ maurice) i dont believe in fall and spring whats the point im done now since my mom said so ok bye peepslzzzes.

i figure i might as well post something since im bored well im not realy bored just sad that my guitar is broken and my downstairs computer is not functioning i went one for three in my repairing of things 1i fixed my playstation 2cant fix computer 3 cant fix guitar i guess i leave my guitar at ross on tuesday when i have my lesson i want to save up for a new guitar jackson or schecter

Do you know whats not funny. Insomniac it the worst show ever. But that aside its not funny. I could make a show where i stay up all night but there would be less drinking. My monitor isnt yellow anymore because i put a new one on my computer so now i can see the colors they are so vibrant. the new brightnes that has befallen me like a giant shroud of colors the screen engulfs my face i sit and stare in awe it is so beautiful to me once it was dull and lifeless like the moon without the sun but now i see what colors can do to forge the light and destroy the dark a poem about the new monitor. nobody expects the spanish inquisition are you suggesting the cocunuts migrate yes, yes i am ok boredom people should read this and be enlightened about the world and all my knowledge. I know all. Except for not all. GOt it good. but seriously i dont know what it means to be stupid or smart or blonde the dog knows evil i bored ill tell a story There was a time when evil ruled the world. The evil came in form of snails. THeir shells were inpenertable and the speed was to fast for anyone to follow. But once during the reign of evil an uprising was led by several ducks. They worked in seceret and buit an army that could finaly stand against the evil snails force. The ducks were finaly ready to attalk. In the dark of night the ducks moved in. They marched all the way to the city of snailsdom and the battle began. The snails were prepared for the attack they clashed with the ducks the battle ended and the ducks were vitorious then the ducks were evil and humans beat them and thats were we are today. nice yeah done

You know whats fun inhaling helium it makes your voice funny but i bet you know that. we did that at dan mcvetys birthday ian did six balloons that damn junkie what a stoner. Ive been sitting all day not doing anything ive been playing my guitar now that i finaly have it back im gonna be the best some day.(tommorow ten years whenever) Bordom "gotta go right know" over active bladder ill have to avoid bill for a while because he is going to want to beat me up since we have a deal whenever anyone is absent we get to beat up a part of them. (strange i know but it gives encouragement to go to school) but whatever. so whats up? dont answer to your computer I cant here you or maybe i can who knows why would i be able to hear you from miles away you could be realy loud or i could have cameras in your house and microphones. im watching you while you were all at school i broke into all your houses and put in spy cameras so dont do anything incriminating or else ill have to book you Jeremiah is just getting home know how do i know that camera or window maybe yes maybe no look up can you see me or am i just a figure of your imagination ahhhgg the sun if i had it my way i would get rid of the sun it gets on my nerves it so bright and annoying and the only thing the highly advanced human race has invented to beat the sun are sunglasses thats seems weak. or maybe sunglasses are controlling our minds speaking of mind control here are some of my conspirecy theorys since "all theory is logic"(bill) i would know We did go to the moon and we have gone much futher and there are humans living in a far away galaxy try to prove me wrong. See you cant so ha Leaves are evil they kill Another thing to watch out for is porcelin figures they can attack at any moment so watch your back. The cereal industry i trying to make kids addicted to sugar the biggest drug on earth all humans have just built up a tolerance for it Dont forget im watching you i am still ahhhh i just realized you could be watching me the government could be watching me i think the government knows so much more that they dont tell the citizens i wish they would tell me iwouldn give away the seceret those snowflakes hanging on the window next to me are frigtening do you think truckload of dead babies is a good band name or is it just too disturbing look to your left what do you see i see a living room with a tv fireplace and a ceiling fan ahhhhhh ceiling fan what day is it today the 11 we got a new minivan that when i get my license i can drive to school and stuff a minivan what a chick magnet all the ladies will be like oh what a sexy car lets get naked ahhhh the phone is ringing (seven days) it was just my mom im going to rant again about my thoughts on other journal websites if you wrote your journal on paper you wouldnt have faces unless you felt like drawing them they annoy me all those crazy backgrounds make me angry oh yeah i was going to count how many days until i get my license 96 days allmost halfway there i feel bad for people in drivers ed i just sat there and drew pictures so fun yeah they dont call it hot chocolate for nothing it is hot and it is chocolate today i saved a bird i want a dollar ooooooooooooohh valentines day is 3 days maybe then ill get a dollar THe wayne Brady show your so rainbow i sat on a fat and skittles came out your so cordless your phoned tripped over you stupid jokes from lunch yesterday you know whats great cold black coffee thats the ticket bleh ow shut up og ot lleh oh no you enjoy your grits maury is on no thats a show bordom is sinking in ive been saing the word amiss alot lately and nobody knows what it meens so know i have the dictionary amiss- out of the proper course of order; improper or faulty understand now so i can say it and you will understand what i meen now im naked under my clothes if i had a out of controll ten year old i would just kick their ass i wouldnt take any crap like that lets look up some more words in the dictionary yak- a shaggyhaired wild ox of the tibetan highlands eyeball- the ball or globe of the eye confucious- chinease philosopher and teacher harakiri- ceremonial suicide by ripping open the abdomen with a knife trolop- a slovenly woman;a premiscuous women thats enough of that im done for now.............................................

IM home sick today, but good thing i am because a bird just hit the window so i brought it inside and i will bring back to health until its ready to go back outside. 11:30 bird hits window 11:31 i put it in a pet carrying case 11:32 it stood up 11:35 i tried to feed it peanut butter mixed with water wouldnt eat 11:36 it chirped 11:41 the bird hopped around 11:41 i let it outside and it flew away only a 11 minute recovery im good
Im talking to bill right now

This is what the government would be if i ruled a country. I think land should be evenly divided between the citizens and everyone should be equal. Money should be equaly divided between all citizens and everyone should be employed based on their skills. Now you could call this communism but in theory it works as long as there is no corrupt leaders. To choose a leader the citizens would still elect him but i would eliminate political parties so there would be less arguments between nominees. They could still voice their views but they wouldnt be named a this or that. Ill work out the kinks later. So besides that Danmcvetys birthday party was fun today. Our video we made went great it was the best hit of the party(we watched it three times). I thought i did an excellent job playing a ninja and dan mcvetys girlfriend. But best lead role goes to Bill playing dan Mcvety what a funny video. I never realized how freaky my house is in the night when the wind is howling outside oh well i dont realy care but now im going to sleep. poem about tonight its actualy a joke walking through the woods is there something behind me? its looking its watching the wind howls in the night should i run? it runs too or should i stay? its touching me. i feel it.

I have been thinking a lot lately about how I would rule society. First (since many wars are fought based on religion) I would have to unite the world under one religion. Many people would be against that and many people would fight against it. But once my armies had destroyed the uprisings we would all be united under one religion. That brings me to my next point how can people get along when they live so far away from each other. I would create a new massive continent called Oneland.Comunication would be easy and no one would need to leave the country. That's another thing, the world would be one country so there would be no land disputes. Everyone would also share a land equally divided to make wars over land impossible. All resources would be evenly distributed and since some jobs are more difficult than others people would be paid based on the difficulty work they do. The only competition in the world would be to get a better education and a better job. Race also causes fighting amongst humans, I know this sounds bad but I would have to make the world one race. How I would create this one race is that I would combine all the features of every race on earth into one. Don't you think that's a little better than the way the Germans thought during the holocaust. To govern each section of the world I would have a clone of myself. Those are just the basic foundations of my world. 50 firt dates sucked or at least i think so It never ended he just had to make her remember him every day unless wait i think i figured it out just know actualy she could remember him only slightly in her dreams now i understand sorry to those who havent seen it yet but it angered me.

On the eleventh day of the third month in the year of two thousand and four the first sign of the beatle fell from the heavens. It came to us in the form of primitive righting around a hoop. At that time i and my apostles began to follow the will of the great beatle.At this timwe were happy we recited the prayers of the Beatle and rejoiced in his glory. Soon we came to a fork in the road, we had to choose right or the left. One follower broke away claiming the Beatle to have spoken to him and tol him to follow the path alone. I continued right. I feared the Badger of the underworld may have led me astray. I returned to my home and spoke with the betrayer. His words had convinced and engaged me in a nonstop battle against the forces of the badger of the underworld.

Right know its 11:00 and I'm supposed to be sleeping because I have sats tomorrow but I cant sleep now. Anyway I have been reading people journals and I've decided that a lot of people are depressed. I don't really understand why. I'm not ever depressed at all, I'm not always happy but I'm always indifferent to whatever is happening. I guess some people have things to be upset about and I guess I really don't have any problems to worry about. Everyone watch aqua teen hunger force

In should realy start writing in that health journal that is due tommorowd i will later i guess. Anyway the holy war is still on Bill your suicide journal is weird nobody gets mad at stuff you do usually you only think its you and you not fat you thick. and now to work on my health journal.

Well its 12:57 am right now and i have to get to school for 7:30 tommorow for the memorial day parade. So lets do the math thats about six and a half hours from now. Oh and by the way Bill i read you journal so if you read this know that i do read it. Im not realy tired right now and i dont know when im going to go to sleep. Today was my dads birthday and we went to a redsox game. Oh god the south park movie is on. Anyway in the stands at the game it seemed like it was realy hot for the 12 innings the game lasted. Then after the game We all went to the Saint ritas festival at oakland beach. The maurices went in the van and we meaning Me,Ian,Ryan,Bill,and Alicia went in his car and couldnt find a parking spot for half an hour that was fun even though i could never get shot gun. Our band eight dollar car sounds realy good. I wanted to record us on friday but the tape recorder wasnt working so i didnt. We can play two songs now, i know thats a massive set but its a good start. That was also our first full practice with the entire six piece band.

Ah so today i have pretty much gotten over my sickness which has kept me couch ridden and vomiting for four days. Who wants to start a new country with me? This country is ruined and we have a president that speaks like bill writes his essays. so we all need to just start a new country without war, poverty,hunger,and anything else that is wrongful.A world where we all follow the biddings of the beetle and do whatever his glory commands. If we are to do the world will be cured of the evil that dwells among us. Gaspee Parade tommorow hopefuly i shall be entirely cured by then. When i went to the doctors yesterday they stuck things down my throat, and needles in my vains it was fun. When i got my blood taken out for the test they were doin i laughed and the doctor made fun of me because i shaked will the whole time there was a needle in me taking out blood but needles make me laugh they tickle. So at the doctors place the strep test came back negative and the mono test was also negative so by process of illimination of course i had sypa loppa itis osis. And now i leave you with the words of ben franklin "If your head is made of wax dont walk in the sun."

hi peeps
to the top
urlLink

LET us go then, you and I, When the evening is spread out against the sky Like a patient etherised upon a table; Let us go, through certain half-deserted streets, The muttering retreats 5 Of restless nights in one-night cheap hotels And sawdust restaurants with oyster-shells: Streets that follow like a tedious argument Of insidious intent To lead you to an overwhelming question … 10 Oh, do not ask, “What is it?” Let us go and make our visit. In the room the women come and go Talking of Michelangelo. The yellow fog that rubs its back upon the window-panes, 15 The yellow smoke that rubs its muzzle on the window-panes Licked its tongue into the corners of the evening, Lingered upon the pools that stand in drains, Let fall upon its back the soot that falls from chimneys, Slipped by the terrace, made a sudden leap, 20 And seeing that it was a soft October night, Curled once about the house, and fell asleep. And indeed there will be time For the yellow smoke that slides along the street, Rubbing its back upon the window-panes; 25 There will be time, there will be time To prepare a face to meet the faces that you meet; There will be time to murder and create, And time for all the works and days of hands That lift and drop a question on your plate; 30 Time for you and time for me, And time yet for a hundred indecisions, And for a hundred visions and revisions, Before the taking of a toast and tea. In the room the women come and go 35 Talking of Michelangelo. And indeed there will be time To wonder, “Do I dare?” and, “Do I dare?” Time to turn back and descend the stair, With a bald spot in the middle of my hair— 40 [They will say: “How his hair is growing thin!”] My morning coat, my collar mounting firmly to the chin, My necktie rich and modest, but asserted by a simple pin— [They will say: “But how his arms and legs are thin!”] Do I dare 45 Disturb the universe? In a minute there is time For decisions and revisions which a minute will reverse. For I have known them all already, known them all:— Have known the evenings, mornings, afternoons, 50 I have measured out my life with coffee spoons; I know the voices dying with a dying fall Beneath the music from a farther room. So how should I presume? And I have known the eyes already, known them all— 55 The eyes that fix you in a formulated phrase, And when I am formulated, sprawling on a pin, When I am pinned and wriggling on the wall, Then how should I begin To spit out all the butt-ends of my days and ways? 60 And how should I presume? And I have known the arms already, known them all— Arms that are braceleted and white and bare [But in the lamplight, downed with light brown hair!] It is perfume from a dress 65 That makes me so digress? Arms that lie along a table, or wrap about a shawl. And should I then presume? And how should I begin? . . . . . Shall I say, I have gone at dusk through narrow streets 70 And watched the smoke that rises from the pipes Of lonely men in shirt-sleeves, leaning out of windows?… I should have been a pair of ragged claws Scuttling across the floors of silent seas. . . . . . And the afternoon, the evening, sleeps so peacefully! 75 Smoothed by long fingers, Asleep … tired … or it malingers, Stretched on the floor, here beside you and me. Should I, after tea and cakes and ices, Have the strength to force the moment to its crisis? 80 But though I have wept and fasted, wept and prayed, Though I have seen my head [grown slightly bald] brought in upon a platter, I am no prophet—and here’s no great matter; I have seen the moment of my greatness flicker, And I have seen the eternal Footman hold my coat, and snicker, 85 And in short, I was afraid. And would it have been worth it, after all, After the cups, the marmalade, the tea, Among the porcelain, among some talk of you and me, Would it have been worth while, 90 To have bitten off the matter with a smile, To have squeezed the universe into a ball To roll it toward some overwhelming question, To say: “I am Lazarus, come from the dead, Come back to tell you all, I shall tell you all”— 95 If one, settling a pillow by her head, Should say: “That is not what I meant at all. That is not it, at all.” And would it have been worth it, after all, Would it have been worth while, 100 After the sunsets and the dooryards and the sprinkled streets, After the novels, after the teacups, after the skirts that trail along the floor— And this, and so much more?— It is impossible to say just what I mean! But as if a magic lantern threw the nerves in patterns on a screen: 105 Would it have been worth while If one, settling a pillow or throwing off a shawl, And turning toward the window, should say: “That is not it at all, That is not what I meant, at all.” . . . . . 110 No! I am not Prince Hamlet, nor was meant to be; Am an attendant lord, one that will do To swell a progress, start a scene or two, Advise the prince; no doubt, an easy tool, Deferential, glad to be of use, 115 Politic, cautious, and meticulous; Full of high sentence, but a bit obtuse; At times, indeed, almost ridiculous— Almost, at times, the Fool. I grow old … I grow old … 120 I shall wear the bottoms of my trousers rolled. Shall I part my hair behind? Do I dare to eat a peach? I shall wear white flannel trousers, and walk upon the beach. I have heard the mermaids singing, each to each. I do not think that they will sing to me. 125 I have seen them riding seaward on the waves Combing the white hair of the waves blown back When the wind blows the water white and black. We have lingered in the chambers of the sea By sea-girls wreathed with seaweed red and brown 130 Till human voices wake us, and we drown.
